title: Hey Duggee - Treasure Hunt Badge
cardDescription: The Treasure Hunt Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 8 and has a treasure chest with a yellow round frame.
description: The Treasure Hunt Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 8 and has a treasure chest with a yellow round frame.

content.content: Badge is worked as a spiral so no joining rounds until the outer edge.

content: (3 sc, inc, 2 sc) x6, at last sc pull through with SC [42]
slst, (inc with hdc, 6 hdc) x6, last hdc is made into the first slst, slst [48]

content.content: Fasten off and hide the yarn ends.
Treasure Chest is done in one part. If the part comes a bit deformed, you can make correction when sewing it in place.

content: with brown ch 9, sc to 2nd ch from hook and across, turn [8]
ch with yellow, working back loops only (which are currently facing you) skip one st, 6 sc, slst into last st, turn [8]
ch with black, sc to blo, with yellow and both loops 4 sc, slst, turn [6]
ch, skipping slst 3 sc, with black 2 sc, turn [5]
ch, 3 sc, with yellow sc, with black sc, turn [5]
ch with brown, 4 sc to the side of the black part, turn [4]

content.content: Fasten off. Sew in place and hide the yarn ends. Sew a keyhole with a bit of yellow.
Sew few small bits of red and cyan to the gold pile. Sew a necklace hanging from the chest by alternating blue and light blue bits.
